alert.note: Alert for Lake; Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 19 at 10:51AM EST until December 23 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Florida... St Johns River Near Astor affecting Volusia and Lake Counties. .The Saint Johns River at Astor continues in Minor Flood stage, but near Action Stage. Northerly winds through will slow or halt the decline, and may even cause brief rises. The river is forecast to hold around the threshold of Minor Flood and Action Stages, possibly alternating between stages, through mid week. A slight rise in the river level may occur mid week, but is then forecast to eventually resume a slow decline. For the St. Johns River...including Astor...Minor flooding is forecast. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued tonight at 1100 PM EST. && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...St Johns River Near Astor. * WHEN...Until early Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 2.3 feet, Minor flooding of low lying streets and yards north of Fox Road on Lake County side of Astor, and from River Road northward on Volusia side of river. Water begins to cover docks at South Moon Fish Camp. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:30 AM EST Monday the stage was 2.3 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to hold around 2.3 feet through the early week, rise to 2.4 feet mid week, and then fall to 2.2 feet this weekend. - Flood stage is 2.3 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Thu Fri Sat St Johns River Astor 2.3 2.3 Mon 9 am 2.3 2.4 2.3 2.2 MSG &&
